short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides all verification checkmarks on Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides all blue checkmarks while you are using Twitter. I made this just for fun, and with zero previous coding experience! 

If you enjoy it, and want to support a starving artist prone to extreme procrastination and distractions (like this extension) you can do that here: https://ko-fi.com/shanefolke 

Enjoy!
